about_the_game:
Deadswitch 3 is an action packed fast-paced 2D multiplayer shooter.

RANKED PROGRESSION

Progress through the ranks by earning XP in-game by killing enemies, scoring objectives, and completing challenges. Unlock new weapons, attachments, perks, and killstreaks to help you achieve victory in combat. Play solo or team-based game modes with other players online, or play local games against bots to hone your skills.

OBJECTIVE-BASED MISSIONS

Play solo or team up with a friend to complete objective-based Operations. Turn up the difficulty to earn Operation Stars and other rewards. Decide on the best strategy to complete each mission; go in loud or use stealth as your friend.

CO-OP SURVIVAL

Play one of many Survival modes and last as long as you can against endless waves of terrorists, helicopters, zombies, and other creatures. Submit your score in the worldwide leaderboards.

KEY FEATURES

  • Multiple game modes and maps
  • Massive selection of weapons, attachments, and equipment
  • Fully customizable characters
  • Ranked matches and multiplayer clans
  • Custom classes and killstreaks
  • Intense fast-paced gameplay

About the Game

Deadswitch 3 is an action packed fast-paced 2D multiplayer shooter.

RANKED PROGRESSION

Progress through the ranks by earning XP in-game by killing enemies, scoring objectives, and completing challenges. Unlock new weapons, attachments, perks, and killstreaks to help you achieve victory in combat. Play solo or team-based game modes with other players online, or play local games against bots to hone your skills.

OBJECTIVE-BASED MISSIONS

Play solo or team up with a friend to complete objective-based Operations. Turn up the difficulty to earn Operation Stars and other rewards. Decide on the best strategy to complete each mission; go in loud or use stealth as your friend.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Linux OS
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Deadswitch 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (3.10GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.50GHz)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit highly recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.20GHz)/AMD Ryzen 7 2700 (3.20GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980/AMD Radeon R9 390X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit highly recommended.

short_description: Deadswitch 3 is a fast-paced 2D multiplayer shooter. Experience action-packed combat with hundreds of weapons and multiple solo and team-based game modes.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Italian, French, German, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
